unnormalised: The transfer window has been quite eventful. Jamshedpur FC's acquisition of young midfielder Arjun Singh is a promising move, reminiscent of a calculated chess move from a Mani Ratnam film.  Will he be the next Sunil Chhetri?  Rs. 2 Cr seems a bit steep though. East Bengal's defense needs reinforcement; another 3 players minimum.  Negotiating contracts takes time; hopefully, deals get sealed before August 15th.  Mohun Bagan should focus on homegrown talent. This season promises to be a thrilling contest, especially with I-League teams bolstering their squads. Perhaps the Sports Authority of India can offer insights.
normalised: The transfer window has been quite eventful. Jamshedpur F C's acquisition of young midfielder Arjun Singh is a promising move, reminiscent of a calculated chess move from a Mani Ratnam film. Will he be the next Sunil Chhetri? Rupees two crore seems a bit steep though. East Bengal's defense needs reinforcement; another three players minimum. Negotiating contracts takes time; hopefully, deals get sealed before fifteenth August. Mohun Bagan should focus on homegrown talent. This season promises to be a thrilling contest, especially with I-League teams bolstering their squads. Perhaps the Sports Authority of India can offer insights.
